suncertify.ui.listeners

Class BrowseDatabaseButtonListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • suncertify.ui.listeners.BrowseDatabaseButtonListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class BrowseDatabaseButtonListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Common listener class for when the user clicks on the browse button in a config dialog. When the browse button is clicked this action listener launches a JFileChooser dialog to select a database file, the text field of the dialog is then populated with this value
    Author:
    Kieran O'Brien

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BrowseDatabaseButtonListener(ConfigDialog configDialog, javax.swing.JTextField dbFilePathTextField)
      Creates a new BrowseDatabaseButtonListener object with a reference to the config dialog text field containing the path to the database.

      • BrowseDatabaseButtonListener

        public BrowseDatabaseButtonListener(ConfigDialog configDialog,
                            javax.swing.JTextField dbFilePathTextField)
        Creates a new BrowseDatabaseButtonListener object with a reference to the config dialog text field containing the path to the database.
        Parameters:
        configDialog - The configuration dialog where the browse button was clicked
        dbFilePathTextField - The JTextField component of the configuration dialog class that is creating this action listener
